Functions

void arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_init (arrow_problem *problem, arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params *params)
 Sets default parameters for Lin-Kernighan heuristic:
  • random_restarts = 0
  • stall_count = problem->size
  • kicks = (problem->size / 2), at least 500
  • kick_type = CC_LK_GEOMETRIC_KICK
  • time_bound = 0.0
  • length_bound = 0.0
  • initial_tour = NULL.

void arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_destruct (arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params *params)
 Destructs a LK parameters structure.

 Solves TSP with Concorde's exact solver.

 Solves TSP with Concorde's Lin-Kernighan heuristic.

void arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_init ( arrow_problem *  problem,
arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params *  params 
)

Sets default parameters for Lin-Kernighan heuristic:

  • random_restarts = 0
  • stall_count = problem->size
  • kicks = (problem->size / 2), at least 500
  • kick_type = CC_LK_GEOMETRIC_KICK
  • time_bound = 0.0
  • length_bound = 0.0
  • initial_tour = NULL.

Parameters:
problem [in] problem to solve
params [out] LK parameters structure

Referenced by arrow_tsp_cc_lk_solve(), and main().
